hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Do not walk in one sandal, either wear both sandals, or go barefoot." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. He said: There is something on this topic from Jabir

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْمَشْىِ فِي النَّعْلِ الْوَاحِدَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Walk In One Sandal
